about_section.title: ABOUT
about_section.main_description: Tantai is a business specializing in agricultural products, especially coffee. With extensive experience, we connect closely from farmers, traders to domestic and international customers, committed to bringing high-quality products and professional services.
about_section.secondary_description: With over a decade of experience in agricultural products, Tantai continuously expands its scale and improves quality, focusing on domestic trade, export business, and warehouse services with key products such as coffee, rubber, and cashew nuts. At the same time, we invest heavily in modern warehouse systems and logistics, ready to serve customers.

products_section.title: TANTAI'S BUSINESS PRODUCT LINES
products_section.center_image_alt: Lush green coffee plantation landscape with mountains and blue sky

coffee.name: Coffee
coffee.description: Coffee is one of Vietnam's key export items. Tantai Company provides the highest quality and most reliable coffee to customers.

tapioca.name: Tapioca Starch
tapioca.description: Tapioca starch is widely used in the food industry. Tantai Company has been investing heavily in tapioca starch production and is highly regarded by partners for its quality.

star_anise.name: Star Anise
star_anise.description: Star anise, a popular spice originating from Vietnam and China. Tantai Company produces and exports high-quality star anise to many international markets such as Asia, EU, and the US.

rubber.name: Natural Rubber
rubber.description: With a large raw material area, advanced production technology, and a team of experienced experts, Tantai Company provides high-quality rubber products for domestic and international markets.

cashew.name: Cashew Nuts
cashew.description: A globally popular food. Tantai Company supplies whole and roasted cashew kernels, ensuring high quality according to International standards.

cinnamon.name: Cinnamon
cinnamon.description: Vietnam is one of the world's leading suppliers of high-quality cinnamon. Tantai Company is a leading producer and exporter of organic cinnamon, aiming to plant 1,000 new hectares annually by 2030.

news_section.heading: Many opportunities for coffee export growth
news_section.description: According to the General Department of Customs, from the beginning of 2024 to October 15, Vietnam exported 1.13 million tons of coffee with a turnover of 4.44 billion USD, a decrease of 11.1% in volume but an increase of 39.1% in value compared to the same period in 2023.

hero.title: About Us
hero.description: Tantai Trading is a leading company providing professional business solutions in Vietnam. We are dedicated to helping businesses grow and succeed.

company_intro.title: Company Introduction
company_intro.paragraph1: Tantai Trading is proud to be a pioneer in the agricultural sector, specializing in investment, production, distribution and export of leading agricultural products in the region. We focus on developing key products such as coffee, pepper, star anise, cinnamon - items that represent the quality and value of Vietnamese agricultural products.
company_intro.paragraph2: With a business philosophy that prioritizes quality, each Tantai Company product is carefully nurtured from cultivation, harvesting to processing and packaging, ensuring international standards. Our network of global customers and partners is a testament to the commitment to quality and trust that the company has built over time.
company_intro.paragraph3: Tantai Company's production system includes a system of modern processing factories in many provinces, combined with a network of purchasing stations spread throughout the provinces. A team of experienced experts and professional management models help us ensure efficient operation, quickly and accurately meeting customer needs in a competitive business environment.
company_intro.paragraph4: We believe that customer satisfaction is the guiding principle for all activities. With the motto "Quality, Honesty, Happiness," Tantai Company not only provides high-quality products but also commits to meeting international standards such as USDA Organic, EU Organic, HACCP, BRCGS, Halal, Kosher, Fairtrade and ISO 22000, ISO 9001 and building sustainable value for the community and the economy.

vision_mission.title: Vision & Mission
vision_mission.vision_content: Tantai Company aims to become a leading enterprise in the field of agricultural products and food in Vietnam, while affirming a solid position in the international market, especially becoming a company owning Vietnamese agricultural products with global brands.
vision_mission.mission_content: Bringing Vietnamese agricultural values to the world, accompanying farmers to improve production quality, contributing to building a sustainable agricultural economy. The company is committed to continuous innovation to meet the increasingly diverse and demanding needs of global customers.
